title: Ghostcrawlers tumblr has some great game design insight
body:
I've been reading this a bit and thought it might interest you guys =D

http://askghostcrawler.tumblr.com/

There are a lot of topics ranging from

Masteries - http://askghostcrawler.tumblr.com/post/154182025868/was-keystones-a-rushed-idea-no-hud-visibility

Simulation vs play testing - http://askghostcrawler.tumblr.com/post/154094471763/what-are-your-thoughts-on-internal-testing-vs

How should players give useful feedback - http://askghostcrawler.tumblr.com/post/154088028828/how-do-you-think-players-should-provide-feedback

Thoughts on why players don't want to play support - http://askghostcrawler.tumblr.com/post/153923542358/how-many-competing-theories-are-there-answering

What do you do Ghostcrawler? - http://askghostcrawler.tumblr.com/post/153913257688/directly-relationated-with-lol-what-is-it-that

Hope it's interesting and insightful! would love to hear what you think of each topic or if you found any other topic on his blog really cool.

replies.body: Riot dont want to make a good game, they want to make skins.
